name: iThing
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, turn off the light”
”Alexa, set light to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
iThing is specialized in R&D, production and sales of IoT products such as ZIGBEE, WIFI and Bluetooth.

You can use ALEXA voice to control smart products in your home, company or store, etc. For example:

- Control the light, adjust the brightness, adjust the color temperature, adjust the color and mode.

- Control the socket and open or close the curtains.

- Control air conditioning, temperature adjustment, mode, etc.
